div.head: Plates
div.p:
Face Ib. svasti śrīmatāṁ sakala-jagad-abhiṣṭūyamāna-mānavya1106-sagotrāṇ[ā*]ṁ hāriti-putrāṇāṁ kauśikī1107-vara-prasāda-labdha-rājyānāṁ mātr̥-gaṇa-paripālitānāṁ svāmi-mahāsena-pādānudhyātānāṁ bhagavan1108-nārāyaṇaprasāda-samāsāditavarāha-lañchanānāṁ aśvamedhāvabhr̥tha-snāna-pavitrī1109-kr̥ta-vapuṣāṁ caḷukyānāṁ kula-jaladhi-samuditendor nnaya-vinaya-vikramopārjita-cāru-bhūri-kīrtteḥ śrī-jayasiṁghavallabhamahārāja-priyānujasyendra-samāna-vikramasya śrīn[dra]1110-bhaṭṭārakasya sūnor1111 aneka-samara-saṁghaṭṭopalabdha-
Face IIa. yuddha-vijaya-yaśaḥ-prasūtyāmoda-gandhādhivāsita-sakala-dig-maṇḍalasya nānā-śāstrābhyāsopabr̥ṁhita1112-vimala-viśāla-buddhe[ḥ*] tyāg-audāryya-dhairyya-kā[n*]tyādi-guṇālaṁkr̥tasya(ḥ) śrī-viṣṇuvarddhana-mahārājasya(ḥ) priyatanayaḥ samatiśayita1113-pitr̥1114-guṇa-śakti-sampanna ānvīkṣikyādi1115-vidyā-praśneṣu1116 vijaya-siddhi[ḥ*] sv[ā*]si-dhāraṇānamita-ripu-nr̥pati-makuṭa-taṭa-ghaṭitāneka-maṇi-kiraṇa-rāga-raṁjita1117-caraṇayugaḷaḥ parama-brahmaṇyo mātā-pitr̥1118-pādānudhyātaḥ śrī-sarvvalokāśraya-mahārājaḥ kraṁja-v[ā*]stavy[ā*]ya kāśyapa1119-gotr[ā*]ya
Face IIb. āpastaṁba-sūtrāya1120 taittirīya1121-sabrahma-cāriṇ[e*]1122 kuliśarmmaṇa[ḥ*] pautrāya doṇaśarmmaṇa(ṇa)ḥ putrāya kuṇḍi-doṇaśarmmaṇe karmarāṣṭre nutulapaṟu-nāma-grāme dakśiṇa1123-diśāy[āṁ*] padanta-kṣetra[ṁ*] dattam1124 revadistane br[ā*]hmaṇa-kṣetra[m*][+|] dakṣiṇata[ḥ*] taṭ[ā*]kaṁ [paścimataḥ*] peṇukapaṟabuṁ-br[ā*]hmaṇa-kṣetra[m*][+|] uttarata[ḥ*] nidubaṁ-ṟupanta[+|] pūrvvata[ḥ*]1125 doṇavādipanta-br[ā*]hmaṇa-kṣetra[m*][+|] dakṣiṇata[ḥ*] etakaṇḍa-nāmā-brāhmāṇa1126- kṣetra[m*][+|] paścimata[ḥ*] veḷeṟukaṇḍi-nāma-br[ā*]hmaṇa-kṣetra[m*][+|] uttarata[ḥ*] etakaṇḍa-nāmā-brāhmaṇa-kṣetra[m*][+|] pūrvvata[ḥ*]1127 śrama-taṭāka-br[ā*]hmaṇa-kṣetra[m*][+|] pascimata[ḥ*] br[ā*]hmaṇa-kṣetra[m*] [+|]
Face IIIa. uttarata[ḥ*] veḷuka-taṭāka-br[ā*]hmaṇa-kṣetra[m*][+|] pūrvvata[ḥ*]1128 koṟinipa ?1129 [brāhma]ṇa-kṣetra[m*] [+|] dakṣiṇata[ḥ*] ca tac-catur-avadhiḥ1130 dv[ā*]-daśa-kaṇḍika-kodra[va*] ?1131 [kse]tra[m*] uttarāyaṇa-nimitte udaka-pūrvaṁ1132 sa(ṁ)rva-kara-parihārena1133 datta[m*][+||] [pravarddhamāna-vija]ya-rājya-saṁvatsare viṁśe1134[+||] atra vy[ā*]sa-gītā[ḥ*] ślokāḥ1135[+||] bah[ubhir vvasudhā dattā] bahubhiś cānupālitā[+|] yasya yasya yad[ā*] bhūmi[ḥ*] tasya [tasya tadā phalam][+||](1) sva-dattāṁ para-dattāṁ v[ā*] yo hareta1136 vasundharām[+|] ṣaṣṭi1137-va[rṣa-sahasrāni] viṣṭhāyāṁ jāyate kr̥miḥ[+||](2) ājñāpti[ḥ*] nissaramiji 1138[+||]
